mention.text: a wandering swordsman with a cheerful attitude and a strong will
Kaoru Kamiya at her kendo dojo , which is being threatened by an impostor claiming to be Battousai
Rurouni Kenshin : Meiji Kenkaku Romantan tells the story of Kenshin as he strives to save those in need of saving .
